text: Tommy Ramone, also known as Thomas Erdelyi (born Erdélyi Tamás; January 29, 1949 - July 11, 2014), was a Hungarian-American record producer and musician.Tommy Ramone Gives the Mountain Music Shoppe a Brush with CBGB He was born to Jewish parents in Budapest and grew up in Queens, New York City. He was the drummer for an early and important punk rock band, the Ramones. ==References== Category:American bluegrass musicians Category:American drummers Category:American record producers Category:American rock musicians Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Musicians from Budapest Category:Hungarian Jews Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Deaths from cholangiocarcinoma Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Tommy Ramone
